venue.name: Wentworth Hills Golf and Country Club

item.description:
Depending on weather and people's interest, I'll reserve tee time for sometime in the morning of Saturday. If you want to join us, sign up and stay tuned for the exact time. If your plans change, please let me know at least 2 days in advance so that we don't pay for no shows.

9:54am, 10:03am and 10:12am. 3 tee times, members guest rate ($42 walking and $58 riding). Itâ€™s under Boston Golf Group, Attn: Zhen.
item.how_to_find_us: Outside club house or around putting green

group.name: The Boston and Beyond Golf Group

item.name: Wentworth Hills GC at Plainville MA
